content: Floor 48003 Bilbao Vizcaya Spain Decentralised agencyEuropean Banking Authority (EBA)The European Banking Authority works to implement standard rules for banking regulation and supervision in all EU countries.Websitehttps://www.eba.europa.eu/Emailinfo@eba.europa.euPhone number+33 (0)1 86 52 70 00Address Tour Europlaza 20 Avenue André-Prothin 92400 Courbevoie France EU institutionEuropean Central Bank (ECB)The European Central Bank manages the euro and implements EU economic and monetary policy.Websitehttps://www.ecb.europa.eu/home/html/index.en.htmlPhone number+49 69 13 44 0AddressSonnemannstrasse 20 60314 Frankfurt-am-Main Germany Decentralised agencyEuropean Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control helps prepare EU governments in stopping the spread of infectious diseases.Websitehttps://www.ecdc.europa.eu/enEmailinfo@ecdc.europa.euPhone number+46 8 586 010 00Address Gustav III:s Boulevard 40 16973 Solna Sweden  1Page
